metadata.name: Sign-in Failure Due to Conditional Access Requirements Not Met
metadata.comment: Define a baseline threshold for failed sign-ins due to Conditional Access failures

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM authentication WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (CAST(status_id AS INT) = CAST(53003 AS INT) AND lower(status_detail) = lower('blocked by conditional access'))

output.summary: Define a baseline threshold for failed sign-ins due to Conditional Access failures

metadata.objective: False positives: 1. Service Account misconfigured 2. Misconfigured Systems 3. Vulnerability Scanners Reference: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-gb/entra/architecture/security-operations-privileged-accounts
